game.name: DCS: F-14A/B Tomcat by Heatblur Simulations
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Downloadable Content, Captions available, VR Support, Partial Controller Support
game.shortDescription: The Grumman F-14 Tomcat was a two-crew, variable geometry, maritime air superiority fighter that served with the US Navy for 32 years and continues to serve with the IRIAF in Iran. The F-14 was the US Navy's frontline fighter from the 1970s until the mid 2000s.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Grumman F-14 Tomcat was a two-crew, variable geometry, maritime air superiority fighter that served with the US Navy for 32 years and continues to serve with the IRIAF in Iran. The F-14 was the US Navy's frontline fighter from the 1970s until the mid 2000s.
